name: Klats Jump Jump
description:
Klats Jump Jump is a hyper casual endless arcade game. Help Klats collect the crystal blue jewels before time runs out. Avoid obstacle like falling mines and snatch those jewels. Collect power-ups such as time-up(gives extra time) and the hyper juice(makes Klats fly).

Very simple controls, use the D-pad or arrow keys to move. Invite your friends over and compete to see who will maintain top score.

CONTROLS

D-Pad (Movement) (Game Controller)

Arrow Keys (Movement)
